about_the_game:
You are 19 year old Tyrone Watermelon -- ambitious paranormal investigator and convenience store clerk, eager for a big break. When you receive a call from a man calling himself Roane Vaydich asking you to investigate his haunted house, you are ecstatic. Finally, a chance to get your name out there!

At the end of your perilous journey lies a fat paycheck -- $25.99, to be exact -- enough to kickstart your career, or maybe even pay off that old guy that sold you those funny-looking brownies the other day...

But these ghosts are different... spookier... scarier... retardeder...

Five Nights at Roner's: Remastered is a ground-up recreation of the original game, which was made in three days. This remake brings it up to the standard set by Five Nights at Roner's 2, which was made in six months. Complete with a full visual overhaul, several gameplay improvements/additions, and a (finally) coherent story, Five Nights at Roner's has never been better...

So, without further ado, can you survive...

FIVE

NIGHTS

AT

RONER'S?

content_descriptors.notes: Contains references to drug abuse/generally crude humor.

detailed_description:
You are 19 year old Tyrone Watermelon -- ambitious paranormal investigator and convenience store clerk, eager for a big break. When you receive a call from a man calling himself Roane Vaydich asking you to investigate his haunted house, you are ecstatic. Finally, a chance to get your name out there!

At the end of your perilous journey lies a fat paycheck -- $25.99, to be exact -- enough to kickstart your career, or maybe even pay off that old guy that sold you those funny-looking brownies the other day...

But these ghosts are different... spookier... scarier... retardeder...

Five Nights at Roner's: Remastered is a ground-up recreation of the original game, which was made in three days. This remake brings it up to the standard set by Five Nights at Roner's 2, which was made in six months. Complete with a full visual overhaul, several gameplay improvements/additions, and a (finally) coherent story, Five Nights at Roner's has never been better...

So, without further ado, can you survive...

FIVE

NIGHTS

AT

RONER'S?
name: Five Nights at Roner's: Remastered

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: 200 Mhz Pentium processor or higher
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Capable of running Direct3D 9 or later
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Capable of stereo (Surround sound) audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-13600K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 TI
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: You are an ambitious paranormal investigator searching for his big break. When you're presented the opportunity of a lifetime--$25.99, to be exact, you jump at the offer. But everything comes with a catch, and Roner and his friends are keen to teach you that...
